Text: If anyone is willing to continue adding -tNe torrents to TPB by all means feel free to do so.  I'll even let you have the password to this account, or you can add them on your own account. Either way would work just fine.

-- HELP WANTED --

Looking for non-USA members of familiarity and trustworthiness to take over this account and add tNe torrents. 

It would be an extremely simple task; get the .torrent file from another site and upload here with the same torrent description.

Whoever wants to help out will not even have to download the video files, only the very small 20kb .torrent file.  You may also download the videos for yourself as I will still be seeding new releases via seedbox.
Sad to see you go, thank you for all the files you've shared, greatly appreciated!

Any followers of me here can simply come follow me on kat, 1337x, or extratorrent  =D

I am not done capping and sharing; just am not feeling so safe here at the bay with all the media attention it has.
Lol IK what you mean by this, the scene is more secure than P2P but unfortunately it's "exclusive" and the scene hates p2pers. :P
